subject: Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
Deaths (Fatalities)
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: On Tuesday, Michael Baze, 24, was found dead in his Cadillac Escalade near Gate 5 on the backside of Churchill Downs.
snippet: On Tuesday, Michael Baze, 24, was found dead in his Cadillac Escalade near Gate 5 on the backside of Churchill Downs.
